author: Monica Showalter
title: Wokester bloodbath: Blue San Francisco throws out three Board of Education leftists by monster margins

sentence: Republican Rep. Jim Jordan has sent a letter to the House Judiciary Committee Chairman Rep. Jerry Nadler, a Democrat, demanding a hearing to address the rise of crime and theft at retail stores across the country.
author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Rep. Jim Jordan demands Democrat chair hold judiciary hearing on spike in retail crime

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, on Tuesday sent a letter to House Judiciary Chairman Jerry Nadler, D-N.Y., demanding a hearing on what Jordan called the recent "unprecedented spike" in retail theft in cities across the country.
author: Jack Gournell
title: Rep. Jim Jordan Demands Hearing on Retail Crime Spike

author: Ashe Schow
title: San Francisco Becomes First City To See $5 Per Gallon At The Pump

sentence: --Trump could push investigations for every Democrat misdeed in the present administration and last one -- and assign Jim Jordan and Matt Gaetz to lead the committees interviewing the witnesses.
author: Jeffrey A. Rendall
title: The Right Resistance: Trump says he won’t be Speaker; there are many reasons why he should be

sentence: Troy Nehls, a Texas Republican, simply wrote, “Make Twitter Great Again,” while Rep. Jim Jordan praised Musk on Fox, painting him as the embodiment of “free speech.” Last Saturday, Musk rejected an offer from Twitter to join the company’s board—a move that would have barred him from acquiring a Twitter stake greater than 14.9%.
author: Caleb Ecarma
title: Right-Wingers Are Absolutely Eating Up the Idea of Elon Musk Taking Over Twitter
